channel.title: Help with NPC talk

item.title: Help with NPC talk
item.dc:creator: @bbl111 bbl111
item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

Hey I just coded in some NPC talk into my server and those NPCs wont talk at all.

Heres the code I used to make the talk in NPCHandler.java

[code] else if (npcs[i].npcType == 492)
{
if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “WELCOME TO CREATESCAPE! DO ::rules AND ::commands!!!”;
}

					}[/code]

Any help here?

Read full topic
